metadata.title: CVE-2025-22376 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Net::OAuth::Client in the Net::OAuth package before 0.29 for Perl, thedefault nonce is a 32-bit integer generated from the built-in rand()function, which is not cryptographically strong.

criterions.comment: libnet-oauth-perl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
